description:
WARNING!!! If you have already enrolled for our course "Be A Great Manager. Build Your Career. Earn More Money" Then you DO NOT need to enroll for this one as it is a part of our large 10 hour course.

This short 90 min. course will provide you with a set of instruments and solutions for effective career audit, planning and growth as well as your prospects in a current company and under your current superior manager.

In 90 minutes of this course you will:

  • Review & access your career prospects
  • Analise your current superior manager and the company you work in
  • Perform your professional orientation
  • Prepare for MMPI testing and will interpret its results
  • Increase your reputation and advance within your company
  • Use networking to aid your career
  • Know when to work hard to advance and when to quit if the company is not worth it

The course consists of 1 section and 5 lectures.

The Video part you will cover in 90 minutes.

The Homework part may take you several days to complete.

______________________________________________________________________

Pricing: $9 is an introductory price.

It is about to change to $19 very soon and later even to $39.

So take your chance to enroll for this super attractive price before time runs out!
______________________________________________________________________
title: Plan Your Career. Build It Solid. Advance & Get To The Top!
